project_abstract.cdata: The First Oil Palm Project comprises: (a) establishment of about 8,500 ha of oil palms, of which about 6,000 ha at Mbongo Estate and about 2,500 ha at Eseka Estate; (b) setting up of a palm oil mill on each of the two estates, which by the end of the project development period will have capacities of 20 tons/hr at Mbongo and 12 tons/hr at Eseka; (c) building of a warehouse and office at Douala; and (d) provision on each estate of necessary roads, buildings and other infrastructure.
